frontmatter.title: Building an Intelligent Harry Potter Search Engine
frontmatter.description: A Full-Stack Web App for hosting BERT on Azure Containers

mdx.excerpt: To prove that the header isn't clickbait - here's what we're going to build: In this article, we walk through this use-case: Building a BERT…

items.title: Use case - cutting edge Natural Language Processing on your data
BERT simplified - Why Google Search is so good
Question 1: Where is Azkaban fortress located?
Question 2: What is the name of Harry's pet owl?
Question 3: What is the name of Argus Filch's pet cat?
Question 4: What school did Viktor Krum go to?
Question 5: What is Hagrid's mother's name?
Question 6: What is Ginny Weasley's actual first name?
